greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1) = 1; a(n > 1) = Sum_{k = 1..n-1} Sum_{d|k, d < k} a(d).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: G.f. A(x) satisfies A(x) = x + (x/(1 - x)) * Sum_{k>=2} A(x^k). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Sep 06 2019
program: (MAGMA) sol:=[1]; for n in [2..56] do Append(~sol, &+[sol[d]*Floor((n-1)/d-1):d in [1..n-1]]); end for; sol; // _Marius A. Burtea_, Sep 07 2019
(PARI) seq(n)={my(v=vector(n)); v[1]=1; for(n=2, #v, v[n]=sum(k=1, n-1, v[k]*((n-1)\k - 1))); v} \\ _Andrew Howroyd_, Sep 07 2019
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Oct 07 2018
